name: Council Assassinations
notes: Murdered council members in Stormharbor and other cities.
Possibly linked to the Bloody Thorn.
Both Oogway and Slip recognized an assassin.

name: Azorian’s Quest: The Celemîr Teltaur
notes: Stormharbor's Celemîr Teltaur is cursed (Weledor’s connection).
Tidewater's Celemîr Teltaur is in Slip's possession.
Currently in Sandhaven; Inara promised the Celemîr Teltaur to Oogway if they succeed.
Need the remaining Celemîr Teltaur for Azorian.

name: Dorian’s Fate
notes: Trapped in Twilight’s Cradle.
Connected to the Shattered King.

name: Void Poison
notes: The party has witnessed the poison's effects firsthand.
They possess several pearls containing the poison.
Thodian is currently poisoned.

name: Silvermask Enslavement
notes: Party was branded with spelled tattoos by the Silvermask.
Josh had a bounty on him.
Azorian broke the spell; Gukki died in the process.
They may still be tracked if discovered.

name: Time and Universe Discrepancies
notes: There are signs that events are repeating.
Mentions of past actions done by the party—unknown to them.
Presence of amnesiacs with no memory.
Timelines are inconsistent among characters.
In some futures, Azorian is missing.

name: Elrich Malachite
notes: Apparent leader of the Shadowblades.
